legal.title: Legal Documents
legal.subtitle: Please review and accept the following documents
legal.minorNotice: Parental consent required for users under 18

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.fullContent:
Last Updated: January 1, 2026

1. INTRODUCTION AND ACCEPTANCE
These Terms are a legal agreement between you and TacticIQ.

2. VIRTUAL ITEMS
Points and XP cannot be converted to real money.

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
All rights belong to TacticIQ.

4. CONTACT
legal@tacticiq.app

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.fullContent:
Last Updated: January 1, 2026

1. DATA COLLECTION
We process device ID, IP, location and activity data.

2. YOUR RIGHTS
You can request deletion of your data.

3. CONTACT
privacy@tacticiq.app

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.fullContent:
Last Updated: January 1, 2026

1. COOKIE USAGE
We use cookies to improve your experience.

2. COOKIE TYPES
- Essential
- Functional
- Analytics
- Marketing

3. MANAGEMENT
Settings menu

kvkk.title: KVKK Disclosure
kvkk.fullContent:
DATA CONTROLLER: TacticIQ
kvkk@tacticiq.app

PROCESSED DATA:
- Identity
- Contact
- Activity
- Device/IP

YOUR RIGHTS:
kvkk@tacticiq.app
